meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>discussion</kanji> <kanji>member</kanji> talks about all the really important things that need to be discussed for the sake of the country. They are a <vocabulary>member of the Diet</vocabulary>. The Diet is Japan's version of congress. <vocabulary>Diet members</vocabulary> discuss really important matters.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
